General.Name: Imago Mulia Persada Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk engages in the wholesale trading of household appliances and equipment. The company sells imported and locally produced furniture through showrooms. It also operates an online platform Laflo.com for selling its products. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Menara Karya, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950
